title: Episode #676 - Ha Ha Heart Problems - Aaron Berg, Dave Temple, Danny Polishchuk, and Mike Figs
description:
Comedians Dave Temple, Aaron Berg, Danny Polishchuk, & Mike Figs join Big Jay Oakerson and Dave Smith to discuss Jay's stint as a nude photographer, Aaron's stripping days, and Lizzo and Bad Bunny making news at the VMAs. All This and More, ONLY on The Most Offensive Podcast on Earth, The LEGION OF SKANKS!!!

Air Date: 08/29/22

Support our sponsors!
